text: Lintong railway station () is a railway station of Longhai railway located in Lintong District, Xi'an, Shaanxi, China. The station is currently out of passenger services. == History == The station was opened in 1934. == References == Category:Railway stations in Shaanxi Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1934
title: Lintong railway station
